general.text: Why are you interested in this role?

web developer.text: Tell me about your experience with web development.
Which front-end and back-end technologies are you familiar with?
How do you ensure your websites are secure and optimized?
Describe a challenging web project you worked on.

Describe a project where you extracted insights from data.
How do you validate your machine learning models?
